writer.name: Stephen Patrick Walker Stephen Patrick Walker

director.name: Stephen Patrick Walker Stephen Patrick Walker

introduction: A worried father (Tony Denham, The Football Factory) goes to the isolated forest of Greenwood in hope of finding his son Pat Cullen (Mark Hutchinson, The Pigman Murders) who has been missing for over two years and as he makes his way towards the last destination he was seen, he notices further proof that he is still alive. With dark twists and turns that await him he meets Jason McNamara (Michael Corcoran) and his mates who are there for a fun weekend which is short lived as they now must all battle for their lives as the stories around Greenwood are true....and those stories mean that you must run to survive.
